issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
I find HADOOP_USER_CLASSPATH_FIRST is used inconsistently. Somewhere set it true, somewhere set it yes.
I know it doesn't mattter because it affects classpath once HADOOP_USER_CLASSPATH_FIRST is not empty
BUT Maybe it's better that using  HADOOP_USER_CLASSPATH_FIRST uniformly

hi [~aw]
could you please give suggestions and review it ?

leave it to AW; I don't go near the bash scripts. 

Do note that everything was radically redone for 3.x. your JIRA should mark the versions effect and suggest a target version, with 2.9 being the one I'd consider

hi [~aw]
Is the patch considered? How do you think?
